cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 30 miles south of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northeast just offshore of the U.S. East Coast, expected to graze the North Carolina coast Friday then accelerate toward Atlantic Canada
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: North Carolina coast (Cape Fear–Cape Lookout area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch/Warn extended from Edisto Beach SC northward; none issued for Georgia coast
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Edisto Beach SC to South Santee River SC; Hurricane Warning South Santee River SC to NC/VA border
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southeastern U.S. shoreline from northern Georgia through the Carolinas and northward to New England
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤3%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; occasional gusty squalls possible as Dorian passes well offshore.
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor inundation possible along the Georgia barrier islands, generally below 3 ft.
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rainbands may produce 1–3 inches of rain; flooding threat is low.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Hazardous surf and rip currents through Friday
